member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject.EnableModeless
member.summary: Enables or disables modeless dialog boxes when the container creates or destroys a modal dialog box.
member.param: Indicates whether to enable modeless dialog box windows (TRUE) or disable them FALSE.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject.OnDocWindowActivate
member.summary: Notifies the active in-place object when the container's document window is activated or deactivated.
member.param: The state of the MDI child document window. If this parameter is TRUE, the window is in the act of activating; if it is FALSE, it is in the act of deactivating.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject.OnFrameWindowActivate
member.summary: Notifies the object when the container's top-level frame window is activated or deactivated.
member.param: The state of the container's top-level frame window. This parameter is TRUE if the window is activating and FALSE if it is deactivating.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK on success.

member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject.ResizeBorder
member.summary: Alerts the object that it needs to resize its border space.
member.param: A pointer to a structure containing the new outer rectangle within which the object can request border space for its tools.
A pointer to an interface pointer for the frame or document window object whose border has changed.
This parameter is TRUE if the frame window object is calling IOleInPlaceActiveObject.ResizeBorder; otherwise, it is FALSE.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: The specified parameter values are not valid.
There is insufficient memory available for the operation.

member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject.TranslateAccelerator
member.summary: Processes menu accelerator-key messages from the container's message queue. This method should only be used for objects created by a DLL object application.
member.param: A pointer to an structure for the message that might need to be translated.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: The specified parameter values are not valid.
IThere is insufficient memory available for the operation.

member.name: IOleInPlaceActiveObject
member.summary: Provides a direct channel of communication between an in-place object and the associated application's outer-most frame window and the document window within the application that contains the embedded object. The communication involves the translation of messages, the state of the frame window (activated or deactivated), and the state of the document window (activated or deactivated). Also, it informs the object when it needs to resize its borders, and manages modeless dialog boxes.
